fact_check_explanation_title: It is not true that worldwide terrorism has stopped while western countries fight Covid-19
fact_check_explanation_summary: A widely shared post on Facebook claims international terrorism has ‘stopped’ as a result of western countries being ‘busy’ fighting the new coronavirus.
In 1918 Philadelphia saw 200,000 attend a parade, despite reports of influenza in the city. After the parade, cases skyrocketed.

fact_check_explanation_title: How does UK foreign aid spending compare to NHS donations
fact_check_explanation_summary: UK foreign aid spending was £15 billion in 2019. Donations to the NHS Charities Together totalled £457 million last year.

fact_check_explanation_title: Covid-19 prevention claims put down to Unicef go viral again
fact_check_explanation_summary: Gargling with salt, putting clothes out in the sun, and ‘any mask’ will not stop you getting Covid-19.

fact_check_explanation_title: Any health secretary will be the owner of this NHS supply company, not just Matt Hancock
fact_check_explanation_summary: The company was created by the Department of Health.

fact_check_explanation_title: An image of a dog vaccine for a different coronavirus has gone viral
fact_check_explanation_summary: There isn’t a vaccine for the new coronavirus yet.

fact_check_explanation_title: This video of a man wiping his hands on a public lift was not filmed in Wales
Viral claim about France’s tax-free health care workers bonus needs context
fact_check_explanation_summary: Care workers in nursing homes will get a bonus but we don’t yet know how much.

fact_check_explanation_title: There is no evidence supporting claims about a government-run network of fake NHS Twitter accounts
fact_check_explanation_summary: Viral posts on social media claim to have uncovered a network of fake Twitter accounts created to post pro-government messages. There is no evidence for this.

fact_check_explanation_title: Not all New Zealand MPs have been ordered to take a pay cut, and UK MPs have not awarded themselves a £10,000 bonus
fact_check_explanation_summary: The New Zealand pay cut does not apply to all MPs, and UK MPs can only claim extra money for office costs.

fact_check_explanation_title: JustGiving are not keeping £2m from donations to Captain Tom
fact_check_explanation_summary: Posts on social media claim the platform kept money raised by the veteran and intended for NHS Charities Together.

fact_check_explanation_title: The German government hasn’t billed China for “coronavirus damages”
fact_check_explanation_summary: An article in the Express suggested the German government had billed China for “coronavirus damages.” The bill was mocked up by a German newspaper.
